songs.title: Freedom
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Look at those beautiful eyes
She reminds me so much of me
Starting out in a brand new world
Who she gonna be?
Will she follow everything that's been said?
Maybe listen to her heart instead
Maybe she needs to be free
She got that from me

[Verse 1]
What you get is what you see
It's a fantasy life, but it's real to me
And I'll do what I want when I want to do it

[Pre-Chorus]
I didn't want to live in a box or mansion fault with doors and locks so I never let anyone put me through it

[Chorus]
Need that freedom, skin it
Freedom, bop it
Freedom, sell it
Give it up to you
Need that freedom, skin it
Freedom, bop it
Freedom, sell it
Do it all for you
